title: A utility company recently buried cables along Torchwood and Beacon Drives in Ogden. The work was completed weeks ago, yet they left behind broken signs, machine tracks in the ground, and uprooted roots and debris. Who was the contractor and are there county and/or state regulations governing site cleanup?
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.
